text:
Message 843 of 4024
Please stop. I did not tell him that. I said that I am not allowed to talk to you and want to work with you. But now we can’t. What do you want from
me?
You said many times you were moving forward. I have no idea where you have landed today and your story changes. We really need a running list
sync.
Per my employment, you know you told the State of Washington I have been beating my kids and will likely do it again so you need protection.
We both know. The kids know. Everybody alive knows, that is a flat out lie. The ultimate betrayal and undermining of me as a father and person.
Please stop the non-stop daily assault through the legal system. It is counterproductive and hurtful. I want to work with you. Not fight fires.
Sent:01/30/2024 at 07:34 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/30/2024 at 08:21 AM)
Subject:Re: SAAS/Adrian
Message 844 of 4024
Did you understand this incredibly clear explanation from both me and the fact check from the foremost AI tool known to man?
It’s so good that there has been congressional testimony around the possibility and timing of when it could become sentient.
If none of that convinces you, then you are either incapable of understand, or being intentionally uninformed. Not sure what to do.
Please share this with the boys if it helps. But, for the love of god, please allow me to explain this if it scares them. It’s all very real and relevant.
Sent:01/30/2024 at 07:39 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/30/2024 at 08:21 AM)
Subject:Re: WiFi/connected devices/kids communication
Message 845 of 4024
This has all come down to one issue. Period. You and the boys think I am tracking you. It comes up on every thread.
You make statements that are true for one scenario and false in another. But accuracy is important in this discussion.
Please find a way to facilitate a discussion and education on what we have now or had as a happy family before.
Then we can severe what we want, as I asked you to do for my own safety for Xfinity and ATT accounts. It’s super simple.
But to keep spinning and trying to create lawyer bait is really unhelpful. Please stop. Please let me answer your questions.
This will have a long term impact on our family if we keep deceiving our kids by intentionally not educating them. Please stop.
All of this. Our entire situation is based on disinformation. This will come out at some point. Please open yourself education.
Sent:01/30/2024 at 07:54 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/30/2024 at 08:22 AM)
Subject:Stop the Forked Threads
